sentence.Network_en: I think that the vice president was in the loop.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为副总统是局内人。

sentence.Network_en: The Regent hotel has a superlative view of Hong Kong island.
sentence.Network_cn: 在丽晶酒店看香港岛的美景，视野绝佳。

sentence.Network_en: The vice-president seems to have a good working relationship with the president.
sentence.Network_cn: 副总统似乎与总统有着良好的工作关系。

PerfectNetExp.abs: (《精灵宝钻》索引及附录)[*]副摄政(Vice-regent):第二纪1701年,吉尔加拉德任命爱隆为伊利雅德的副摄政。摄政官的职务是在国王不在时以国王的名义进行统治。[*.
